desc: The Molecular Signatures Database (MSigDB) is a collection of annotated gene sets for use with GSEA software.

fields.name: standard
fields.desc: Gene set name

fields.name: systematic_name
fields.desc: Gene set name for internal indexing purposes

fields.name: historical_names
fields.desc: Comma-separated list of older gene set names, starting from VERSION=V.2.5 of MSigDB

fields.name: organism
fields.desc: Organism name

fields.name: pmid
fields.desc: PubMed ID for the source publication

fields.name: authors
fields.desc: Authors of the gene set source publication, according to PubMed ID

fields.name: geoid
fields.desc: A GEO or ArrayExpress ID for the raw microarray data in GEO or ArrayExpress repository

fields.name: exact_source
fields.desc: Description of the exact source of the set - usually a specific figure or table in the source publication.

fields.name: geneset_listing_url
fields.desc: URL of the original source that listed the gene set members

fields.name: external_details_url
fields.desc: URL of the original source page of the gene set

fields.name: chip
fields.desc: Indicates the type of the original gene set members, equivalent to the CHIP file, e.g., HG-U133A

fields.name: category_code
fields.desc: Gene set collection code, e.g., C2

fields.name: sub_category_code
fields.desc: Gene set subcategory code, e.g., CGP

fields.name: contributor
fields.desc: Name of the person or institution that contributed the gene set to MSigDB

fields.name: contributor_org
fields.desc: Name of the organization associated with the gene set contributor

fields.name: description_brief
fields.desc: Brief description of the gene set

fields.name: description_full
fields.desc: Full description of the gene set or abstract of the source publication

fields.name: tags
fields.desc: Optional tags to enhance gene set annotations; currently not in use

fields.name: members
fields.desc: Comma-separated list of gene set members as they originally appeared in the source

fields.name: members_symbolized
fields.desc: Comma-separated list of gene set members in the form of human gene symbols

fields.name: members_ezid
fields.desc: Comma-separated list of gene set members in the form of human Entrez Gene IDs

fields.name: members_mapping
fields.desc: Pipe-separated list of mappings between gene set members in the form of: MEMBERS, MEMBERS_SYMBOLIZED, MEMBERS_EZID

fields.name: founder_names
fields.desc: Pipe-separated list of v4.0 MSigDB founder gene sets for the hallmark signatures

fields.name: refinement_datasets
fields.desc: Pipe-separated list of GEO or ArrayExpress identifiers of microarray data used to refine hallmark signatures GEO or ArrayExpress ID, comparison details

fields.name: validation_datasets
fields.desc: Pipe-separated list of GEO or ArrayExpress identifiers of microarray data used to validate hallmark signatures GEO or ArrayExpress ID, comparison details
